response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to me, and I believe it would be equally beneficial to you. Considering its significance and the unique features it offers, I am offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its intrinsic worth and other market valuations. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and aligns well with your budget. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to discuss further details with you.", "product_price": 950000}
